This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
Summary: small star like object flying around
divs: Sighting Detailsi was sat in the park with friend when we noticed 'moving stars' 10-20 of these were visible in the time we were there i called a non emergency police team who were confused and had no idea what the objects were the star like objects hovered and then quickly moved to another llocation and sometimes back again there were bright flashes in the sky too
